app.title: Qwerty Learner
app.donate_desc_1: Thanks for using Qwerty Learner. This website is maintained in spare time. To ensure we can continuously provide quality service, we need your help!
app.donate_desc_2: Your donation helps pay for operation costs, improve features and design, and enhance user experience.
app.donate_desc_3: To thank you, for a single donation of 50 RMB or more, we will send 5 custom Qwerty stickers (Mainland China only).
app.mobile_alert: Qwerty Learner aims to improve English typing efficiency for keyboard workers. Mobile is not supported yet. Please use a desktop browser. If you are on a tablet like iPad, you can use an external keyboard.

gallery.disclaimer: Dictionary data comes from various open source projects and community contributors.

report.summary_description: You have reported {{count}} translation issues. Review them below and submit to the maintainer.
report.success_message: Thank you for helping improve the translations. The Google Form should have opened in a new tab.

donateCard.title: {{chapterNumber}} Chapters Achievement !
donateCard.achievement_text: You have just completed <1>{{chapterNumber}}</1> chapters of practice. Qwerty Learner has been with you for <1>{{dayFromFirstWord}}</1> days, completing <1>{{wordNumber}}</1> words of practice together, helping you correct <1>{{sumWrongCount}}</1> typing errors. Let's celebrate your progress together
donateCard.project_info: Qwerty Learner has been operating as <1>open source, ad-free, and non-commercial</1> for <1>{{dayFromQwerty}}</1> days. Our goal is to provide all learners with an efficient, convenient, and distraction-free learning environment. We sincerely invite you to consider donating. Donations will be directly used to maintain Qwerty's daily operations and future development, allowing Qwerty to grow with you.
donateCard.sticker_info: To thank you for your generosity, for a single donation of 50 RMB or more, we will send 5 custom Qwerty stickers <1>(Mainland China only)</1>. We hope you can share your joy with friends

mobile.subtitle: Simplify English learning and typing skill improvement, quickly establish correct muscle memory
mobile.features: Word memory combined with keyboard input, phonetic pronunciation and dictation mode, diverse vocabulary selection
mobile.phonetic_desc: Help users memorize both pronunciation and phonetic symbols of words
mobile.dictation_desc: Choose dictation after each chapter to consolidate learned words
mobile.feedback_desc: Display input speed and accuracy, quantify skill improvement
mobile.programmer_desc: Built-in programming-related vocabulary to improve work efficiency
mobile.easy_title: Easy to use, simple and effective
mobile.easy_desc: Word and muscle memory training software designed for keyboard workers
mobile.desktop_notice: Please use a desktop browser to access this website and experience it now!

advanced.chapter_random_desc: When enabled, words in each practice chapter will be randomly sorted. Takes effect in the next chapter.
advanced.show_prev_next_desc: When enabled, the previous/next word will be displayed above during practice.
advanced.ignore_case_desc: When enabled, input is case-insensitive. For example, typing 'hello' and 'Hello' will both be considered correct.
advanced.text_selectable_desc: When enabled, text can be selected with the mouse.
advanced.show_hint_on_hover: Show Hints on Hover in Dictation Mode
advanced.show_hint_on_hover_desc: When enabled, hover over words to display correct answers.

data.export_desc: Currently, user practice data is only saved locally. If you need to use Qwerty Learner on different devices, browsers, or other non-official deployments, you need to manually sync and save your data. To preserve your practice progress and use the upcoming data analysis and intelligent training features, we recommend backing up your data regularly.
data.export_warning: For your data security, please do not modify the exported data file.
data.import_desc: Please note that importing data will completely overwrite current data. Please proceed with caution.

analysisCharts.total_count: Total {{count}} times in the past year

errorBook.tip: Tip: Click on error words to view detailed information

conclusion.good: Some minor issues, you can do better next time!
conclusion.poor: Too many errors, how about trying again?

resultScreen.author: Click to learn about the author and more works ❤️
